title: Watch: Shah Rukh and Kajol re-enact few iconic scenes of DDLJ
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 20, 2015, 14.43 pm Mumbai: It’s been 20 years for Bollywood’s cult romantic, 'Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayenge' but nothing has changed for Raj and Simran. While Shah Rukh and Kajol are currently shooting for Rohit Shetty’s 'Dilwale' in Hyderabad, director and his team gave a tribute to this eternal couple by shooting a special video on the sets. Shah Rukh and Kajol re-enacted few iconic scenes from their 1995 blockbuster. It’s mere a co incidence that after 20 years the two are shooting the film with the name ‘Dilwale’. Looks like the charm of Raj and Simran hasn’t changed a bit. We leave you with this video, which bounds you to fall in love with them all over again.
